page.title: 08Industry
page.content:
The majority of industrial enterprises in Brightlingsea are fairly small concerns, employing less than forty people. Nevertheless they appear at present to be flourishing.
By far the largest single employer is Astralux Dynamics, a firm specialising in the production of electronic and mechanical components for the telecommunications industry.
{Boatbuilding and Shipbuilding}have both been in decline over recent years. Some ten years ago a large proportion of men working in the town would have been involved in some way with these industries, either directly or through the servicing or supplying of spars, sails or other fittings .Today there are probably less than two hundred.
